name: clanker_deploy_token
description: Deploys an ERC-20 token on Base with automated liquidity. Requires name, symbol, image URL, and description.

TOKEN_NAME.description: The name of the token (e.g., 'ClawBot AI')

TOKEN_IMAGE.description: Image URL or IPFS CID for the token logo

CONTEXT_MESSAGE_ID.description: Warpcast URL or Cast Hash for social indexing

DEV_BUY_ETH_AMOUNT.description: Amount of ETH to buy at launch (minimum 0.001 recommended for indexing)

HIGH_TAX.description: DEGEN MODE: If true, allows fees up to 20% (static) or 30% (dynamic). Use for viral/short-term hype tokens. Note: This loses the Clankerworld Verified Badge.

ADMIN_SPOOF.description: Privacy Masking: Address that will receive the rewards, different from the token owner (Admin). Useful for hiding the dev's primary wallet.

STRICT_MODE.description: Enforce Clankerworld checklist compliance (max 5% fees). Use this for serious long-term projects to get the verified badge.
